awscc_chatbot_custom_action (Data Source)

Data Source schema for AWS::Chatbot::CustomAction

Schema

Required

  • id (String) Uniquely identifies the resource.

Read-Only

  • action_name (String)
  • alias_name (String)
  • attachments (Attributes List) (see below for nested schema)
  • custom_action_arn (String)
  • definition (Attributes) (see below for nested schema)
  • tags (Attributes List) (see below for nested schema)

Nested Schema for attachments

Read-Only:

  • button_text (String)
  • criteria (Attributes List) (see below for nested schema)
  • notification_type (String)
  • variables (Map of String)

Nested Schema for attachments.criteria

Read-Only:

  • operator (String)
  • value (String)
  • variable_name (String)

Nested Schema for definition

Read-Only:

  • command_text (String)

Nested Schema for tags

Read-Only:

  • key (String)
  • value (String)
